name: Jelly Wants More
description:
Why do aliens need beautiful human girls so much? What do the abbreviations BREAST and JELI mean? Why is the breast size so important?

Jelly Wants More is a combination of first-class delusion and simple but catchy game mechanics. Girls with cool shapes and nice jelly are waiting for you! During the game, each heroine's breast gradually increases, and then the girls begin to undress. Jelly Wants More is a great chance to relax, admire beautiful bodies and forget about all your problems.

  • Put the jelly of one type together to get new types;
  • Find out what the aliens want and how they are connected to the colorful jelly;
  • The further you go, the more interesting things you will see and learn.

How important is people's appearance in the scale of the universe? What is the secret of successful intergalactic business? How can ordinary human girls influence the fate of a whole group of galaxies? All the answers you will find in this game.
